well its a quiz. To keep it simple : 
 
 “Sawaal puucha jaega, jawaab aata hai to bataiye”

to translate for the non-desi’s 
 
 “The question will be asked, Answer if you can” 
 
With this theme in mind we have made up a quiz on all things tech. 
The prizes are spectacular, the questions mind boggling so all the trivia junkies are invited to test their hands at some tech trivia. 
 
And remember the motto of Trivialis the quiz club of IIITD :

 ” To every question there are three answers: 
 
 The Right Answer 
 The Wrong Answer 
 The Funny Answer 
 
 And these need to be rewarded”

so welcome to xQuizIT 2013.
